skillDetails.name: Charged Chant
skillDetails.description: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster gains a Charge Stack, it has a 5% chance to also gain Sorcery, Barrier or Channel (Buffs).

monstersWithSkill.skillDescription: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster gains a Charge Stack, it has a 5% chance to also gain Sorcery, Barrier or Channel (Buffs).
